author: COMSOL
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to integrate multiple Lumped Battery models into the Electrical Circuit interface. Two batteries are connected in series. Each battery is protected by a shunt resistances that is activated if the battery state of charge reaches below a certain threshold level.
label: over_discharge_protection.mph
